# Video Feedback Application

Eine interaktive Webanwendung zur Videowiedergabe mit Kommentarfunktion und Zeitmarken.

## üöÄ Funktionen
- Wiedergabe von YouTube-Videos und lokalen MP4-Dateien
- Kommentarerstellung mit automatischem Zeitstempel
- Visuelle Marker im Video-Progress-Bar
- Lokale Speicherung aller Kommentare (localStorage)
- Share-Link Generation mit eingebetteten Kommentaren
- Responsive Design mit Fluid Player

analysis.description: A lightweight web app that lets teams leave precise, time-stamped comments on any YouTube or MP4 video and share them via a single URL. Perfect for fast, asynchronous reviews of marketing, training, or product videos without new logins or complex tooling.

valueProposition: Enable fast, asynchronous video reviews by attaching comments directly to exact timestamps in the video.
Eliminate bulky review workflows by sharing all feedback through a single link that encodes video and comments.
Reduce onboarding and IT overhead with a browser-only tool that requires no installs, accounts, or backend infrastructure.

customerSegments.name: Marketing and creative agencies reviewing video assets with clients
pain_points: Fragmented feedback across emails, chats, and PDFs with unclear video timestamps
Time-consuming review cycles and misunderstandings about which video moment a comment refers to

customerSegments.name: Product teams and UX designers reviewing demo and tutorial videos
pain_points: Difficulty collecting structured, time-based feedback from stakeholders on product demos
Lack of simple tools for non-technical users to comment on specific moments in videos

customerSegments.name: Training and e-learning providers collecting learner feedback on course videos
pain_points: Limited insight into which parts of training videos confuse or disengage learners
No easy way for learners to attach comments to exact points in the video timeline

revenueStreams.source: SaaS subscription for teams (workspace with shared libraries, admin, and export features)
Client-facing review portals for agencies (branded video review spaces per client)
Usage-based pricing for high-volume sharing (per number of shared review links or videos)
